ingredients.ingredient: Â¼ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper

cookingTips: Pat scallops completely dry before wrapping to ensure proper browning
Wrap prosciutto around scallops like a belt, leaving the top exposed for searing
Use toothpicks sparingly or secure just at the end to prevent prosciutto from unraveling
enrichment.coachingPrompt: These elegant bites require precision. Help the user master the technique of patting scallops dry, wrapping them properly, and achieving a golden sear. The prosciutto should crisp while scallops stay tender.
